__TOC__

* '''Ubuntu Release Party - Precise Pangoline 12.04'''
** this May we have organized RP in '''Prague''' (the last two RPs were in <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CzechTeam/TeamReports/11/October|Hradec Kralove]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CzechTeam/TeamReports/11/May|Ostrava]]</nowiki>)
** RP were in training center <nowiki>[[http://wiki.siliconhill.cz/Skolici_centrum|Silicon Hill]]</nowiki>
** all details about this RP are on our <nowiki>[[http://party.ubuntu.cz/|special Czech pages]]</nowiki>
** '''''presentations''''':
** Start 10:00
*** '''Tadeáš Pařík (Ubuntu.cz) - Ubuntu Precise Pangoline 12.04''' - everything about new LTS - <nowiki>[[http://party.ubuntu.cz/sites/party.ubuntu.cz/files/Release_Party.pdf|download]]</nowiki>
*** '''Martin Šácha (Ubuntu.cz) - How is created Czech version of Ubuntu?''' - everything about the Czech translations and about our translation team - <nowiki>[[http://party.ubuntu.cz/sites/party.ubuntu.cz/files/rp_prednaska.pdf|download]]</nowiki>
*** '''Miroslav Hrončok (<nowiki>[[http://www.linuxexpres.cz/|LinuxEXPRES]]</nowiki>) - Xubuntu and Xfce''' - everything about new Xubuntu 12.04 - <nowiki>[[|download]]</nowiki>
** Lunch 12:00 - 13:00
*** '''Radek Neužil (Ubuntu.cz) - Internet security'''
*** '''Ivan Bíbr (Liberix, o.p.s.) - GNOME Shell''' - presentation about GNOME Shell - <nowiki>[[http://party.ubuntu.cz/sites/party.ubuntu.cz/files/GNOME-Shell-IvanBibr.pdf|download]]</nowiki>
*** '''Vojtěch Trefný (Ubuntu.cz) - Czech Ubuntu Community''' - everything about the Czech community  - <nowiki>[[http://party.ubuntu.cz/sites/party.ubuntu.cz/files/prednaska-komunita-1204.pdf|download]]</nowiki>
*** '''Ondřej Profant (Pirati.cz) - OSS in public administration''' - <nowiki>[[http://party.ubuntu.cz/sites/party.ubuntu.cz/files/oss.pdf|download]]</nowiki>
** End 16:00

** all photos from this event can be found <nowiki>[[https://picasaweb.google.com/ubuntuczech/URPPrahaKveten12?authuser=0&feat=directlink|here]]</nowiki>
** topic about this event on our forum is <nowiki>[[http://forum.ubuntu.cz/index.php?topic=61780.0|here]]</nowiki>
